p: An aliquot (3 mL) of the sample was collected periodically after 0, 5, 15, 30, 45, 60, 75, 90, and 120 min and replaced by a freshly prepared equivalent volume of dissolution medium. The withdrawn samples were filtered through a 0.20 μm syringe filter (CHROMAFIL ® PTFE-20/25) prior to TAL analysis with a UHPLC system (Dionex, Ultimate 3000, Thermo Scientific, United States) using the chromatographic conditions reported earlier (32). The dissolution studies were carried out in triplicate.
